definition: unceasing, not wavering or in danger of stopping
details:
adjective
- unceasing, not wavering or in danger of stopping
= example: unceasing, not wavering or in danger of stopping
= synonyms: unflagging, enduring, imperishable, abiding
- always able to supply more
= example: always able to supply more
- not liable to failure
= synonyms: foolproof
